dublinCore.dc:title: 110 HR 1470 EH: Chiropractic Care Available to All Veterans Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.official-title: To amend the Department of Veterans Affairs Health Care Programs Enhancement Act of 2001 to require the provision of chiropractic care and services to veterans at all Department of Veterans Affairs medical centers.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Chiropractic Care Available to All Veterans Act.

section.header: Program for provision of chiropractic care and services to veterans
section.text: Section 204(c) of the Department of Veterans Affairs Health Care Programs Enhancement Act of 2001 (38 U.S.C. 1710 note) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: by inserting (1) before The program; and
by adding at the end the following new paragraph:
The program shall be carried out at not fewer than 75 medical centers by not later than December 31, 2009, and at all medical centers by not later than December 31, 2011.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives May 23, 2007.
